prev_version.title: A reinstall of the Music Assistant integration is needed.
prev_version.description: Music Assistant 2.0 needs a reinstall of the Home Assistant integration. Remove the Music Assistant entry from your Home Assistant integrations and re-add it.

invalid_server_version.title: The Music Assistant server is not the correct version
invalid_server_version.description: Check if there are updates available for the Music Assistant Server and/or integration.

data.url: URL of the Music Assistant server

on_supervisor.title: Select connection method
on_supervisor.description:
Do you want to use the official Music Assistant Server add-on?

If you are already running the Music Assistant Server in another add-on, in a custom container, natively etc., then do not select this option.

data.use_addon: Use the official Music Assistant Server add-on

hassio_confirm.title: Set up the Music Assistant integration with the Music Assistant Server add-on

discovery_confirm.description: Do you want to add the Music Assistant Server `{url}` to Home Assistant?
discovery_confirm.title: Discovered Music Assistant Server

abort.addon_get_discovery_info_failed: Failed to get Music Assistant Server add-on discovery info.
abort.addon_info_failed: Failed to get Music Assistant Server add-on info.
abort.addon_install_failed: Failed to install the Music Assistant Server add-on.
abort.addon_start_failed: Failed to start the Music Assistant Server add-on.
abort.already_in_progress: Configuration flow is already in progress
abort.not_matter_addon: Discovered add-on is not the official Music Assistant Server add-on.
abort.reconfiguration_successful: Successfully reconfigured the Music Assistant integration.

progress.install_addon: Please wait while the Music Assistant Server add-on installation finishes. This can take several minutes.
progress.start_addon: Please wait while the Music Assistant Server add-on starts. This add-on is what powers Music Assistant in Home Assistant. This may take some seconds.
